name: The Woods (itch) (Jparsons)
description:
My first venture into using Twine to create a choose your own adventure based off a classic fairy tale.

Game Concept

The woods starts out with our main protagonist waking up in a dark and unknown place to them. You spend the initial moments of the game trying to understand where you are and if you can find the motivation to arise from your slumber. After looking around the wolf then realises they are high up on a cliff face and they must decide on how to get down, but before making the descend down to the forest they spot their 3 main objectives within the story, a thatched hut, a village and some noises in the distance.
